duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect and assemble all documents necessary for successful import of cargo in a timely fashion.
Review and verify sales contracts, shipping instructions, and Letters of Credit.
Communicate with domestic service providers, global customer base, and banking channels to ensure successful cargo clearance and payment collection.
Work closely with Scoular merchants, logistics department, trade finance, banks, suppliers, customers, and ocean freight providers to make shipments successful.
Respond to customer inquiries and provide updates regarding assigned shipments.
Maintain transparency of progress and ensure all documents are acquired prior to specified due dates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Documentation Management, International Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
